sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import UserAPI from "../API/UserAPI"; import ProductAPI from "../API/ProductAPI"; import HistoryAPI from "../API/HistoryAPI"; function Home(props) { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const [order, setOrder] = useState([]); const date = new Date(); const formatCurrency = (value) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat("vi-VN", { style: "currency", currency: "VND", }).format(value); }; useEffect(async () => { const response = await UserAPI.getAllData(); setUsers(response.data); }, [props.role]); useEffect(async () => { const products = await ProductAPI.getAPI(); setProduct(products.data.products); }, [props.role]); useEffect(async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getAll(); setOrder(response.data); }, [props.role]); const total = () => { let avg = 0; order.map((item) => { avg += item.total; }); return avg/date.getMonth(); }; const avg = total(); return (

Good Morning Jason!

  1. Dashboard

{users.length}

+18.33%
New Clients

$ {formatCurrency(avg)}

Earnings of Month

3

-18.33%
New Projects

{product.length}

Projects

History


{order && order.map((value) => ( ))}
ID User Name Phone Address Total Delivery Status Detail
{value.user._id} {value.user.fullName} {value.phone} {value.address} {value.total} {value.delivery ? "Đã Vận Chuyển" : "Chưa Vận Chuyển"} {value.status ? "Đã Thanh Toán" : "Chưa Thanh Toán"} View
All Rights Reserved by Adminmart. Designed and Developed by{" "} Nguyễn Thanh Tú.
); } export default Home;
